summary.span: 管理角色中的使用者成員資格，以在 ASP.NET 應用程式中執行授權檢查。

span.span: Manages user membership in roles for authorization checking in an ASP.NET application.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 角色管理可讓您管理使用者群組，稱為角色為基礎的應用程式授權。ASP.NET role management enables you to manage authorization for your application based on groups of users, referred to as roles. 將使用者指派給角色，您可以控制不同的組件或功能，而不是或，角色為基礎的 Web 應用程式的存取權來指定使用者名稱為基礎的授權。By assigning users to roles, you can control access to different parts or features of your Web application based on role instead of, or in addition to, specifying authorization based on user name. 例如，員工應用程式可能有角色，例如經理員工、 經理等等，其中每個角色指定不同的權限。For example, an employee application might have roles such as Managers, Employees, Directors, and so on, where different privileges are specified for each role. 使用者可以屬於一個以上的角色。Users can belong to more than one role. 例如，如果您的網站論壇，某些使用者可能是角色的成員和仲裁者。For example, if your site is a discussion forum, some users might be in the role of both Members and Moderators. 您可以定義每個角色，才能在網站上，具有不同的權限，而這兩個角色的使用者會擁有兩組權限。You might define each role to have different privileges on the site, and a user who is in both roles would then have both sets of privileges. 若要啟用角色管理 ASP.NET 應用程式，使用的項目`system.web`在您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段，如下列範例所示。To enable role management for your ASP.NET application, use the element of the `system.web` section in the Web.config file for your application, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 在您的 Web 應用程式的組態檔中或以程式設計方式在程式碼中，您可以指定授權規則。You can specify authorization rules in the configuration file for your Web application or programmatically in your code. 比方說，Web.config 檔案中的下列區段需要使用者登入 （藉由拒絕匿名使用者），並接著只允許使用者在系統管理員角色具有存取權。For example, the following section from a Web.config file requires users to log on (by denying anonymous users), and then allows only users in the Administrators role to have access. ``` ``` 如果您使用`authorization`區段來指定角色，應用程式的使用者為基礎的授權的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中必須提供已驗證的使用者身分識別。If you use the `authorization` section in your application's Web.config file to specify authorization based on roles, users of your application must supply an authenticated user identity. 您可以使用 Windows 或表單驗證驗證使用者。You can authenticate users by using either Windows or Forms authentication. 匿名使用者無法指派給角色。Anonymous users cannot be assigned to a role. 獨立的或與 ASP.NET 搭配使用，就可以使用角色類別。Roles can be used independently of, or in conjunction with, the ASP.NET classes. 若要以程式設計方式驗證角色成員資格，您可以使用類別或屬性方法，或者您可以使用屬性與方法。To verify role membership programmatically, you can use the class or the property with the method, or you can use the property with the method. 以程式設計方式檢查角色成員資格的範例程式碼，請參閱本主題中的範例 > 一節。For sample code that programmatically checks role membership, see the Example section in this topic. 類別也可讓您建立及刪除角色，以將使用者加入或移除角色的使用者。The class also enables you to create and delete roles and to add users to or remove users from roles. > [!NOTE] > 如果您已設定您的應用程式使用類別，您不能修改角色或角色成員資格。If you have configured your application to use the class, you cannot modify roles or role membership. Classverifies Windows 中的成員資格只群組。The classverifies membership in Windows security groups only. 在此情況下，您必須使用 Windows 使用者帳戶管理，而不是 ASP.NET 角色建立和刪除群組及管理群組成員資格。In this case, you must use Windows user account management rather than ASP.NET roles to create and delete groups and manage group membership. 您可以將角色資訊儲存在數個資料來源。You can store role information in several data sources. - 您可以使用擷取角色資訊的類別，根據 Windows 群組的成員資格。You can use the class to retrieve role information based on membership in Windows groups. - 您也可以使用 SQL Server 資料庫中儲存角色資訊類別。You can store role information in a SQL Server database by using the class. - 如果您有現有的角色資訊，或想要儲存中的角色資訊，並從 Windows、 授權存放區或 SQL Server 以外的資料來源擷取角色資訊時，您可以藉由建立繼承實作自訂角色提供者抽象類別。If you have existing role information, or want to store role information in and retrieve role information from a data source other than Windows, an Authorization Store, or SQL Server, you can implement a custom role provider by creating a class that inherits the abstract class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作角色提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d)。For more information, see [Implementing a Role Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d). 如果使用者的瀏覽器接受 cookie，則您可以在使用者的電腦上的 cookie 中儲存該使用者的角色資訊。If a user's browser accepts cookies, you can store role information for that user in a cookie on the user's computer. 每個頁面要求時，ASP.NET 會從 cookie 讀取該使用者的角色資訊。On each page request, ASP.NET reads the role information for that user from the cookie. 這可以減少擷取角色資訊與資料來源所需的通訊，以改善應用程式的效能。This can improve application performance by reducing the amount of communication required with the data source to retrieve role information. 如果使用者的角色資訊太長而無法儲存在 cookie 中，ASP.NET 會就最近使用的角色資訊儲存在 cookie 中，並接著會尋找所需的資料來源中的其他角色資訊。If the role information for a user is too long to store in a cookie, ASP.NET stores just the most recently used role information in the cookie and then looks up additional role information in the data source as required. 如果使用者的瀏覽器不支援 cookie，或停用 cookie，角色資訊不會快取 cookie。If the user's browser does not support cookies or cookies are disabled, role information is not cached in a cookie. 您可以改善快取在 cookie 中，藉由指定的角色名稱的可靠性屬性，當您設定 ASP.NET 角色。You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure ASP.NET roles. 預設值是`All`，它會加密 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。The default is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. ## Examples 下列範例示範設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和 ASP.NET 角色，並使用應用程式的 Web.config 檔案來儲存 SQL Server 資料庫中的成員資格和角色的資訊。The following example shows the Web.config file for an application configured to use both ASP.NET membership and ASP.NET roles and to use the to store membership and role information in a SQL Server database. 使用表單驗證驗證使用者，只有系統管理員角色的使用者，才允許存取應用程式。Users are authenticated with forms authentication and only users in the Administrators role are allowed access to the application. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才讓使用者能夠檢視其他使用者的角色。The following code example programmatically checks whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view other users' roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫指定的使用者與指定的角色，在資料來源建立關聯的預設角色提供者。The method calls the default role provider to associate the specified users with the specified role at the data source. 如果您的應用程式會使用類別，會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新方法會在交易內進行。If your application uses the class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果發生錯誤，例如使用者名稱已在指定的角色，會回復交易，並會執行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. > [!NOTE] > 使用者名稱和角色名稱不能包含逗號。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例的角色中加入一個或多個使用者，或根據使用者輸入在角色中移除使用者。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role based on user input. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存及擷取角色資訊。

value.span: 要儲存和擷取角色資訊的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性由類別不同的應用程式相關聯的使用者和角色。The property is used by the class to associate users and roles with different applications. 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料來源來儲存使用者和角色資訊，而不重複的使用者名稱或重複的角色名稱之間發生衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same data source to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or duplicate role names. 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以藉由指定相同的值中使用相同的資料來源屬性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source by specifying the same value in the property. 您可以設定屬性以程式設計的方式，或者您可以設定它以宣告方式在 Web 應用程式的組態檔中使用`applicationName`屬性。You can set the property programmatically, or you can set it declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果您的 Web 應用程式使用類別和值未指定`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性目前的屬性值屬性用。If your Web application is using the class and a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, the property value for the current property is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為單一的預設角色提供者執行個體用來提供所要求的所有物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入與變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 您應該避免撰寫程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定屬性，除非另有需要。You should avoid writing code to allow users to set the property, unless required. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的角色資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式會使用執行個體和集合`applicationName`屬性設定為`MyApplication`。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `applicationName` attribute to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`在 Web.config 檔案中，每個使用者的角色資訊會儲存在 cookie 中。When the property is set to `true` in the Web.config file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie. 當角色管理會檢查使用者是否具有特定角色時，角色提供者會檢查資料來源的角色清單在呼叫之前檢查角色 cookie。When role management checks to see whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before the role provider is called to check the list of roles at the data source. Cookie 會動態更新快取最近驗證過的角色名稱。The cookie is dynamically updated to cache the most recently validated role names. 您可以改善快取在 cookie 中，藉由指定的角色名稱的可靠性屬性，當您設定 ASP.NET 角色。You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure ASP.NET roles. 預設值是`All`，它會加密 cookie 中的角色名稱，並驗證尚未改變的 cookie 內容。The default is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. > [!NOTE] > 因為除了資料來源，可以在快取角色名稱，就可以變更在資料來源的角色管理不會反映在快取的值。Because role names can be cached apart from the data source, it is possible that changes to role management at the data source would not be reflected in the cached values. 在此情況下，使用者必須關閉再重新開啟其瀏覽器，以清除快取的 cookie 值。In this case, the user must close and re-open their browser to clear the cached cookie value. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式會使用執行個體和集合`cacheRolesInCookie`屬性設定為`true`。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute to `true`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回在角色中的使用者清單，其中的使用者名稱包含提供的相符項目`usernameToMatch`已設定`applicationName`。 returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為 「 使用者 」，則"user1"，"user2，""user3，「 使用者，並傳回等。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user," then the users "user1," "user2," "user3," and so on are returned. 使用者會傳回依字母順序，依使用者名稱。Users are returned in alphabetical order by user name. 會執行其搜尋服務中使用 LIKE 子句針對`usernameToMatch`參數。The performs its search using a LIKE clause against the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 子句可用於像是 SQL Server 中支援任何萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數值。Any wildcards that are supported by SQL Server in LIKE clauses can be used in the `usernameToMatch` parameter value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用根據使用者輸入的方法，以顯示角色成員資格。The following code example uses the method to display role membership based on user input. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考所有啟用的應用程式的角色提供者，包括任何提供者加入 Web.config 檔案中。The property references all the role providers enabled for an application, including any providers added in the Web.config file. 您可以使用哪些角色提供者是適用於應用程式來控制`providers`中您的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段的項目。You can control which role providers are available for an application by using the `providers` element of the section in the Web.config file for your application. 下列範例顯示移除任何現有的提供者 （例如在 Machine.config 檔案中指定的那些） 區段，並將與應用程式的角色提供者執行個體。The following example shows a section that removes any existing providers (such as those specified in the Machine.config file) and adds a instance as the role provider for the application. ``` ``` 您可以取得的提供者的強型別的參考集合中依名稱編製索引的角色提供者，並將它轉型為所需的類型。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the role provider by name and casting it as the desired type. 您可以取得應用程式使用的預設提供者的參考屬性。You can obtain a reference to the default provider for an application using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫`RoleExists`方法來判斷角色名稱是否存在於應用程式的資料來源中指定的預設角色提供者屬性。The method calls the `RoleExists` method of the default role provider to determine whether a role name exists in the data source for the application that is specified in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以判斷角色名稱是否已經存在之前建立的角色。The following code example uses the method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
